channel.title: Hey Mod Taharok
channel.description:
Anyone that knows can answer this, but I'm generally asking for a mod. When you're posting you're forum can you put you're server ip and port under the rules and stuff? I only ask this because I think people will just take the ip and port without reading the rules and commands, then on the server they ask all kinds of different questions that could just be answered by reading the advertisement.
Thanks ~[glow=red,2,300]NinjaSoD[/glow]

yeah but follow rules and layouts

item.title: Hey Mod Taharok

item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

[quote=“adamhack, post:5, topic:44593”]well i want to enter too i know that you are asking for a mod but these is a free people thinking even a noob can enter here and help you so pls when you or anybody post dont ask for the player rank to get help…

got it?[/quote]
But at first I was asking for Taharok since he is the one that kind’ve posted the layout rules in the first place ><

Read full topic

item.title: Hey Mod Taharok

When you’re posting you’re forum can you put you’re server ip and port under the rules and stuff? I only ask this because I think people will just take the ip and port without reading the rules and commands, then on the server they ask all kinds of different questions that could just be answered by reading the advertisement.
